channel.title: Help with Stances and weapon attack speed
channel.description:
[u]First Question:[/u] Ok i recently got this bandos whip..and it attacks really fast like every second, How can i fix it so it goes the speed of a whip?
[u]Second Question:[/u] Ok, I added god swords to my server and i wanted to how how to change the stances of them, they are like a scimitar stance i want it to be real one.
Thanks

item.title: Help with Stances and weapon attack speed
item.dc:creator: @Reisyukaku Reisyukaku
item.description:
@Reisyukaku wrote:

well for stances, i found some stuff in my client.java (btw, im using allstar-scape)
search for stuff like:

public int GetWepAnim()

or

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

or

public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Stances and weapon attack speed
